title: Ep 511 | Jase Gives Update on Miaâ€™s Latest Surgery & Zach Discusses the Idea of Suffering
description:
Jase tells the story about a trip he and Missy took with Mia for her last major surgery and shares the details of a stressful journey and trusting God. Zach explains how suffering allows you to see more of the glory of God. Phil jokes about the unwritten Robertson code: When you make a mistake, say something like "whoa" and don't linger in the moment so that you can move forward with what is good! And Al reveals the only power a person has left when he knows he has done something wrong.
